Reference

All functions

D0_14_Troughs_1cpt_BASE_TSFD

D0_14_Troughs_1cpt_BASE_TSFD model.

D0_14_Troughs_1cpt_BASE_TSFD_MPC

D0_14_Troughs_1cpt_BASE_TSFD_MPC model.

D7_AUC_2cpt_Tlag_CYP3A5_alloWT

D7_AUC_2cpt_Tlag_CYP3A5_alloWT model.

D7_AUC_2cpt_Tlag_CYP3A5_alloWT_MPC

D7_AUC_2cpt_Tlag_CYP3A5_alloWT_MPC model.

Database

Database Class

FileDatabase

FileDatabase Class

InMemoryDatabase

InMemoryDatabase Class

JsonDatabase

JsonDatabase Class

MongoDatabase

MongoDatabase Class

POSIXToDate()

Format a POSIX datetime to a 'Date' object. Note that the returned string will depend on the application timezone.

POSIXToHours()

Convert POSIX date to hours (numeric).

POSIXToPrettyString()

Format a POSIX datetime to a well-formatted pretty string.

POSIXToString()

Format a POSIX datetime to a well-formatted string.

POSIXToTime()

Format a POSIX datetime to a time string. Note that the returned string will depend on the application timezone.

aboutTab()

About tab server.

aboutTabUI()

This tab shows general information out the application.

addNowLabelAndIntercept()

Add now label ('Past' and 'Future') and X intercept to an existing plot.

applyModel()

Apply new selected model. The old model is replaced by the new one. If some covariates are missing, they are added automatically into the covariates data frame, with their default value.

autoSortByDate()

Auto-sort table by date and convert to tibble.

bergmann2014_base

bergmann2014_base model.

bergmann2014_mixture

bergmann2014_mixture model.

checkCovariates()

Check covariates.

checkFirstname()

Check firstname.

checkLastname()

Check lastname.

checkModelName()

Check model name.

convertDataToTdmore()

Convert shinyTDMore domain to TDMore domain.

covariateModelToJson()

Convert covariate model to JSON structure.

covsToTdmore()

Covariates conversion (shinyTDMore -> TDMore). TODO: discuss this code within the team and test it.

createCovariateForm()

Create the covariate form.

createFakePatient()

Create a fake patient.

createPatient()

Patient constructor.

createUserForm()

Create the user form.

dataHasChanged()

Say if data (measures, doses, covariates, now date or model) have been changed by the user.

dateAndTimeToPOSIX()

Convert date and time vectors to POSIX.

debugReact()

Debug react object.

default_alloWT_MPC

default_alloWT_MPC model.

doseModelToJson()

Convert dose model to JSON structure.

editableInput()

Get editable input.

exportPatientToJsonFile()

Export patient to JSON file.

getAppTimeZone()

Get the application timezone.

getCovariateNames()

Get all covariate names of a model. By default, covariate names from the model are returned. For MPC models, only the 'true' covariates are returned (e.g. WT, not TVCl).

getDBDatetimeFormat()

Get the DB datetime format for this project.

getDateFormat()

Get the date format for this project.

getDatetimeFormat()

Get the datetime format for this project.

getDefaultModel()

Get default model. If the given model is not a mixture model, this model is returned. If the given model is a mixture_model, the most likely model is returned.

getDoseColumnLabel()

Get dose column label.

getDosingInterval()

Retrieve the dosing interval from the tdmore metadata according to the specified formulation. If no formulation matches, dosing interval of the first formulation is returned. If no formulation at all in metadata, 24 hours is returned.

getFormulationList()

Get the list of formulations for the given model.

getMeasureColumnLabel()

Get measure column label.

getModelList()

Get the list of available models in this package.

getModelOutput()

Get model output variable name.

getNewdata()

Get 'newdata' dataframe for tdmore predictions.

getObservedVariables()

Get the observed variables from the tdmore model.

getRecommendedDoseColumnLabel()

Get recommended dose column label.

getRoundFunction()

Retrieve the rounding function from the tdmore metadata according to the specified formulation. If no formulation matches, no rounding function is used. If no formulation at all in metadata, no rounding function is used.

getTableBorderIndex()

Utility function to know where the horizontal line corresponding to the now date should be.

getTimeFormat()

Get the time format for this project.

getWinnerFit()

Get winner fit. If the given fit is not a tdmorefit mixture, this fit is returned. If the given fit is a tdmorefit mixture, the winner fit is returned.

getYAxisLabel()

Get a nice Y-axis label.

hackSelectInput()

Hack select input (update it with fake values when dialog is closed). Without this workaround, covariate inputs do not appear when 'new patient' is clicked for the second time.

holdford_base

holdford_base model.

hoursList()

Generate the list of hours that can be picked in the 'hours' combobox.

initDataTable()

Collect data from the mongoDB.

ipredColor()

individual prediction color (red).

isPrivatePatient()

Say if the given patient is private.

isReadOnlyPatient()

Say if the given patient is read-only.

jsonToCovariateModel()

Convert covariates (JSON) to covariates model.

jsonToDoseModel()

Convert doses (JSON) to dose model.

jsonToMeasureModel()

Convert measures (JSON) to dose model.

jsonToPatientModel()

Convert patient (JSON) to patient model

measureModelToJson()

Convert measure model to JSON structure.

mergeFormAndCov()

Join covariates and formulations (shinyTDMore -> TDMore).

mergePlots()

Merge plots.

meropenem_alloWT

meropenem_alloWT model.

metadata(<tdmore_observed_variables>)

Build an 'observed variables' metadata.

modelLibrary

List of available models.

modelTab()

Model tab server.

modelTabUI()

Model tab user interface.

nearEqual()

Near (in)equality function. Different modes: 'ae' : almost equal 'gt' : greater than 'lt' : less than 'ne.gt' : greater than (near equality) 'ne.lt' : less than (near equality)

newPatientDialog()

New patient dialog server.

newPatientDialogUI()

Create a patient form in a modal dialog.

nowColor()

Now color (green).

nowColorHex()

Now color (green) - HEX.

nowDateLogic()

Now date logic.

observed_variables()

Create an 'observed variables' object. These variables will be predicted and shown in the panel below the timeline. TODO: discuss if we keep this info as part of the UI metadata of the model. Should we need a config tab to configure the UI metadata? Do we want to persist this information in DB? Per model? Per patient? etc.

onModelTabExit()

Say if the user went out of the 'Model' tab.

onPredictionTabExit()

Say if the user went out of the 'Prediction' tab.

pad()

Pad integer with a zero if needed.

patientModelToJson()

Convert patient model to JSON structure.

patientsTab()

Patients tab server.

patientsTabUI()

Patients tab user interface.

predColor()

Population prediction color (blue).

predictionTab()

Prediction tab server.

predictionTabUI()

Prediction tab user interface.

prepareParametersPlot()

Prepare the parameters plot.

preparePrediction()

Prepare population OR individual prediction data.

preparePredictionPlot()

Prepare the prediction plot.

preparePredictionPlots()

Prepare population OR individual prediction plots. This includes the prediction plot and the timeline plot.

prepareRecommendation()

Prepare recommendation.

prepareRecommendationPlots()

Prepare recommendation plots (to be refactored). This includes the recommendation plot and the timeline plot.

prepareRecommendedTimelinePlot()

Prepare the timeline with both original and recommended doses.

prepareTimelinePlot()

Prepare the timeline.

previousNextLogic()

Previous/Next button logic.

recommendationColor()

Recommendation color (green).

rejectModel()

Reject new selected model.

removePatientConfirmationDialog()

Remove patient confirmation dialog.

renderPatientTable()

Render the patients table.

reportsTab()

Reports tab server.

reportsTabUI()

Reports tab user interface.

samplesColor()

Samples color (grey).

samplesColorFuture()

Samples color in the future (red).

saveData()

Save data of both user and covariate forms.

saveProject()

Save project server

saveProjectToDB()

Save project into DB (measures and doses from shiny are saved).

selectPatient()

Select patient (last in DB or from URL).

setPatient()

Set patient to shiny app.

shinyInput()

Allow to provide HTML/javascript code in shiny app for custom inputs. Example if FUN is actionButton: <button id=\"removeButton_1\" type=\"button\" class=\"btn btn-default action-button\" onclick=\"Shiny.onInputChange(&quot;removePatientButton&quot;, this.id)\">Remove</button>".

shinyTdmore()

Get server component of Shiny TDMore.

shinyTdmoreUI()

Get UI component of Shiny TDMore.

stringToPOSIX()

Convert a string date to a POSIX datetime.

targetColor()

Target color (grey).

targetLogic()

Target logic.

toPrivatePatient()

Classify a patient as private. These patients will not appear in the patients tab.

toReadOnlyPatient()

Make a patient read-only. A read-only patient cannot be modified in shinytdmore.

updateCovariates()

Update covariates in patient model (convert numeric vector to tibble).

updateModelInSelectInput()

Update the model in the select input component.

updateNowDate()

Update the date of now.

updatePatientCovariates()

Update patient covariates.

updatePatientDoses()

Update patient doses.

updatePatientMeasures()

Update patient measures.

updatePatientModel()

Update patient model and covariates

updatePlot()

Update plot using animation. NOT USED.
